title: 2005/795/EC: Council Decision of 7 November 2005 on the replacement of members of the European Social Fund Committee
header:
17.11.2005 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 300/61
COUNCIL DECISION
of 7 November 2005
on the replacement of members of the European Social Fund Committee
(2005/795/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999 of 21 June 1999 laying down general provisions on the Structural Funds (1), and in particular Article 49 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 24 September 2004 appointing members and alternate members of the Committee referred to in Article 147 of the EC Treaty (2),
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Whereas:
(1) The Council, acting on a proposal from the Commission, by Decision of 24 September 2004 appointed the members and alternate members of the European Social Fund Committee for the period up to 30 April 2007.
(2) In the meantime, the seats of various members have become vacant as a result of resignations.
(3) Members must be appointed to the European Social Fund Committee for the seats that have become vacant,
main_body: The persons whose names are set out in the Annex are hereby appointed members of the European Social Fund Committee for the remaining term of office, i.e. until 30 April 2007, as indicated.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 November 2005.
For the Council
The President
J. STRAW
(1)  OJ L 161, 26.6.1999, p. 1.
(2)  OJ C 252, 12.10.2005, p. 1.
